about_the_game:
Become the best Anime Artist and expand your art collection even further!
This DLC adds 3 new levels to the game with additional artworks to Draw and Color. Just look for the levels tagged with TMTB (The more the better) in the level selection screen!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity, General Mature Content

detailed_description:
Become the best Anime Artist and expand your art collection even further!
This DLC adds 3 new levels to the game with additional artworks to Draw and Color. Just look for the levels tagged with TMTB (The more the better) in the level selection screen!
name: Anime Artist 2: The More, The Better Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 - 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Display 1280x720
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Processor 1.7 Ghz - AMD Processor 1.7 Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Display 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Become the best Anime Artist and expand your art collection even further!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil
